Interface AIAgent

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlphaZeroPlayer, MCTSPlayer, RandomPlayer
public interface AIAgent
Interface for all AI agents that can play the game. Decoupled from concrete Board implementations via AIBoardAdapter. Supports optional lifecycle management for agent initialization and cleanup. Please dont move this class or refactor it as it is working perfectly fine, In case of moving this class to another package will cause a lot of issues with imports and dependencies, I couldnt figure it out for hours so let it be here where it is.
Author:
Team 04

  • Method Details

    • getBestMove

      Move getBestMove(AIBoardAdapter board, Player currentPlayer)
      Determines the best move for this agent.
      Parameters:
      board - The current game board state (via AIBoardAdapter interface)
      currentPlayer - The player whose turn it is
      Returns:
      The chosen move, or null if no moves are available

    • getPlayer

      Player getPlayer()
      Gets the player this agent represents.
      Returns:
      The player (RED or BLACK)

    • controlsPlayer

      boolean controlsPlayer(Player player)
      Checks if the given player is controlled by this agent.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to check
      Returns:
      true if this agent controls the player, false otherwise

    • initialize

      default void initialize()
      Optional lifecycle method called when the agent is set up for a game. Can be overridden by implementations that need initialization. Default implementation does nothing.

    • cleanup

      default void cleanup()
      Optional lifecycle method called when the agent is removed from a game. Can be overridden by implementations that need cleanup. Default implementation does nothing.
